class.rdfs:comment: A PublicationEvent corresponds indifferently to the event of publication for a CreativeWork of any type e.g. a broadcast event, an on-demand event, a book/journal publication via a variety of delivery media.
class.rdfs:label: PublicationEvent

schema:free.rdfs:comment: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.
schema:free.rdfs:label: free

schema:publishedBy.rdfs:comment: An agent associated with the publication event.
schema:publishedBy.rdfs:label: publishedBy

schema:publishedOn.rdfs:comment: A broadcast service associated with the publication event.
schema:publishedOn.rdfs:label: publishedOn
